title: A Whisker Away
description: Miyo Sasaki is an energetic high school girl who comes from a broken family consisting of her unconfident father and an overly invested stepmother, whose attempts at connecting with Miyo come across as bothersome. Seeing Kento Hinode as a refuge from all her personal issues, she can’t help herself from forcing her unorthodox demonstrations of love onto her crush.While Miyo is unable to get Kento’s attention as herself, she manages to succeed by interacting with him in the form of a white cat, af
